column5: Product/@ID of the product that describes the insert.
Index of the parent surface where the insert SHALL be bound in the context of the main product that is referenced by AssemblingIntent/@Container.
Orientation of the insert in the coordinate system of the surface specified by @Folio.
Position of the bottom left corner of the insert in the coordinate system of the surface specified by @Folio after applying all rotations.
Details of the glue used to fasten the insert.
